items.sentence: Tom wondered if Mary knew about what John had done.
Tom wore a yellow T-shirt with a smiley face on it.
Tom is planning on staying in Boston until October.
Tom is scheduled to stay with us until next Monday.
Tom told me he didn\'t really want to go to Boston.
Tom wasn\'t with Mary the last time she visited us.
You still haven\'t told Tom what you did, have you?
You\'ll have to be careful how you behave yourself.
Do you realize what would happen if you drank that?
Do you remember when Tom said he wanted to do that?
